title: [K-12] Augmented Reality-Based Physical Education Learning Model Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental physical education theories and basic smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Applying AR technology to support diverse learners, including those with special needs, with an accessibility-focused design utilizing smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can explain methods for analyzing and simulating physical movements using AR applications
Learners can replicate 3D animation-based exercise techniques with 80% accuracy
Learners can develop self-directed learning plans integrated with AR content on the LMS platform

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
